main event: A UFO sighting occurred on September 15, 1963, in La Grange, Illinois, with reported observations of bright objects moving in zig-zag patterns.
interesting points: The sighting had varied courses as described by the observer,The observation method used was ground-visual,The object was compared with several UFO books and found to match specific descriptions,The witness provided detailed information through a questionnaire related to the sighting,The report included inquiry letters sent to the Department of the Air Force for information on U.F.O.s.
witness description: Male, age 31, with experience pertinent to the sighting.
